images.copyright: The Washington Monument seen from the Lincoln Memorial in Washington, DC (© lucky-photographer/Getty Images)
images.title: Happy Presidents Day
images.caption: Presidents Day
images.desc: On Presidents Day, we take you to Washington, DC's National Mall, the downtown park known as 'America's front yard.' Here, from the front steps of the Lincoln Memorial, you can see all the way across to the Capitol Building, with the tall, white obelisk of the Washington Monument rising in between.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
